thread.title: Brazil’s Levy Sees 2016 Budget Approval as Key to Economic Recovery
thread.title_full: Brazil’s Levy Sees 2016 Budget Approval as Key to Economic Recovery - WSJ

author: Paulo Trevisani
title: Brazil’s Levy Sees 2016 Budget Approval as Key to Economic Recovery
text:
LIMA, Peru—Brazil will start to see economic growth slowly resume two quarters after Congress approves the government’s 2016 budget projecting better fiscal results, Finance Minister Joaquim Levy said Friday.
Mr. Levy spoke to The Wall Street Journal in Peru, where he is participating in the International Monetary Fund and World Bank Fall Summit.
Brazil’s administration sent its Congress a budget plan on Aug. 31 forecasting a...
